title: Captain Marvel Star Brie Larson Gives Blunt Response About MCU Future
description:
The Marvel Cinematic Universe is recognized for a number of major box office hits. Unfortunately, however, The Marvels broke this streak by becoming the MCU’s lowest-grossing movie. Now star Brie Larson, who plays Captain Marvel in the film and several other MCU projects, has given a blunt response regarding her future in the franchise. Due [...]

The post Captain Marvel Star Brie Larson Gives Blunt Response About MCU Future appeared first on ScreenGeek.

title: ‘American Psycho’ Remake Reportedly In The Works For New Generation
description:
Lionsgate has been hard at work with a number of new projects based around their fan-favorite IPs. One of these remake projects appears to be a new iteration of American Psycho. The first American Psycho film, released in 2000, was based on the 1991 novel of the same name by Bret Easton Ellis. The violent [...]

The post ‘American Psycho’ Remake Reportedly In The Works For New Generation appeared first on ScreenGeek.
